name: TriDuel
description:
BUMPER CARS MEETS BREAKOUT

Local multiplayer brawler in which up to three opponents try to knock each other off an arena with breakable walls. Last one standing wins. Features AI for playing with less than 3 hoomans.

This game was developed by Michael Louden as part of the Noisey 24 Hour Game Jam by Wrench Games. The theme was "Three Man Duel". All assets created within the allotted time, with a focus on sound. Controls are customizable in the Unity launch screen, but are initially set up for Playstation DS4 controllers. For 1-3 local players. Enjoy!

UPDATE: 11/14/2016 - TriDuel entering Alpha v0.1!

Due to the awesome support I have received from you itch.io people, I've decided to continue developing this game into a full featured product, starting with a significant update to the interface and customization. New features include the following:

- Updated menu
- Added Options menu (player color selection and controls are here)
- Separated keyboard and controller inputs for more customization
- All three players can now use the keyboard at the same time!
- Individual players can choose whether they want to use a controller or the keyboard
- Button remapping is still available in the Unity launcher 'Input' menu
- Controls are set to Keyboard by default
- If using a controller, the default controller mapping is for Playstation DS4 controllers (remapping for Xbox or other controllers may be required)

Keyboard Controls:

Player One:
W - Forward
S - Reverse
A - Rotate Counterclockwise
D- Rotate Clockwise
Left Shift - Boost
Tab - Start

Player Two:
I - Forward
K - Reverse
J - Rotate Counterclockwise
L - Rotate Clockwise
Right Shift - Boost
Enter - Start

Player Three:
8 - Forward
5 - Reverse
4 - Rotate Counterclockwise
6 - Rotate Clockwise
0 - Boost
Return - Start

Controller:
Right Trigger - Forward
Left Trigger - Reverse
A - Boost
Start - Pause
